content.question: Caspar David Friedrich's painting The Wanderer Above the Mists shown above does which of the following?

choices.label: Foreshadows the calamities of twentieth-century warfare.
Portrays intellectual detachment in an era of revolutions.
Expresses loneliness characteristic of Neoclassical style.
Pays tribute to a famous explorer.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
